CareConnect Open Close Copyrights © %1$d Hi i am your smart drug directory"\n"I can help you finding your urgent drug information Okay Have we met before? Yes No,not yet Nice to meet you You can always change you answer latter if you want to Okay,lets get started with your email address Type your email address Done Please choose a strong password to keep your data safe Type a password Your sign up process has been almost done Show terms and Conditions I have read the terms and conditions"\n"And I accept it Sign up now Furniture Real estate Services Pet care HomeActivity Home Dashboard Notifications // App Used permissions Access Storage Permission:
Used to read files (images) from sd-card and save Health Records-files.

Grant permission later:
If you don\'t permit this now, you can do it later. Please open then \"Settings -> App info\" and choose \"Permissions\". Landscape Choose file with: // App titles Image to Health Records Text to Health Records + image + text | … Edit image Crop image Portrait // Snackbar // Toasts OK Cancel Health Records successfully created. Images successfully created. Open folder? An error occurred. Open? Please install an app to perform action. Please choose an image. Choose or create a Health Records file. Please enter text. Please wait. Saving image. Do not show again No supported file extension Image was edited. Saving? No Entry will be removed. OK? Can\'t open Directory. No files in directory. Please choose image file. Please choose Health Records file. Grant permission. Open settings? // Main menu Share Health Records Open Health Records Settings Save Share Health Records with: In the attachment you can find the Health Records file: Help // Fragments Please enter title: Date Add Image Create Image Add Image Add Text Create Text Whatever you want ... // Text fragment Delete pages Which pages do you want to keep? Write or paste text Edit existing metadata Create new metadata // Editor Contrast Hue Brightness Sharpness Saturation Exposure Highlight Shadow White Balance Color Balance Levels Min (Mid Adjust) // Dialogs Owner password User password Edit filename Choose filter // Settings About the app App directory Encryption Metadata Image quality Set the image quality. Higher quality results in (much) bigger PDF sizes. Backup Do you want to backup pdf files before manipulating, e.g. deleting or adding pages? Custom directory Format: \"/Download/PDF/\" Let empty to use the default directory (\"/Android/data/de.baumann.pdf/\"). Enter the path to your desired folder on your sdcard. The path must begin and end with \"/\" like \"/Download/PDF/\". If the desired directory does not exist, it will be generated automatically. Author Title Creator Keywords Subject App info Open via the system settings the app info of the app. There you can, depending on your Android version, manage several things (Storage, network traffic, permissions, …). High (100%) Normal (80%) Low (60%) 100 80 60 //Image cropper Saving picture … Rotate left Rotate right //File chooser Cancel Share Rename Delete New Report name Sort entries Sort by title Sort by date Sort by extension Search in entries Search in titles Search in creation dates Today Yesterday Day before yesterday This month Own search Cancel search title date extension Health Records Title // About … and other things Changelog, help,used libraries and more. About CareConnect Developer Used open source libraries Extension Report Viewer Intro Show the intro screen one more time. Used to crop and rotate images. Used to build the intro screen. Used to enhance and manipulate pictures. Used to create and manipulate PDF files. Used to convert PDF files to images. Used to create the \"About screen\". The source of nearly all icons. A powerful image downloading and caching library for Android. Android library to easily pick an image from gallery or camera app. // Intro Skip Let\'s start. Track Health Record Thank you for choosing \"CareConnect\". It\'s fully open free and still in development. You can reach a short help dialog on every tab by pressing \"menu -> help\" … The tabs You have a build in file explorer. You can either create new Health Record files from an image or from text or manipulate existing PDFs. Nice to know: At the bottom you can see the name of the actual Report and the format. By pressing this area you can switch between portrait and landscape format for your PDF page.
